issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding Affordable Care Act, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, lowering prescription drug prices

issues.title: Climate Change Mitigation
issues.description: Advocates for renewable energy investments, supports Green New Deal principles, reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, DACA protection

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, workplace equality, paid family leave, strengthening labor unions

issues.title: Gun Safety Legislation
issues.description: Advocates for universal background checks, assault weapons restrictions, closing gun show loopholes

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased public education funding, student debt relief, community college investment

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice advocate, supports protecting Roe v. Wade, opposing restrictions on abortion access
